feedback.feedbackString: Pie should be written from upright to downleft
Pie should start from upright corner

misClassify.feedbackString: Pie and Wan looks similar. but Pie is more flat, and Wan is vertical and thin
misClassify.name: Wan

misClassify.feedbackString: Pie and Ti looks similar, but Pie writes from topright to downleft, while Ti is from downleft to upright; Pie is as more curve, and Ti is a more line
misClassify.name: Ti
